soccerbot

Class USPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • soccerbot.USPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class USPoller
extends java.lang.Thread
    USPoller polls the Ultrasonic sensor every 50 ms for new data and updates the distance accordingly

      • USPoller

        public USPoller(Port usPort)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Continuously get the sampled data from the ultrasonic sensor and sleep for 50 ms. Thsi sampled data represents the distance reported and is filtered and bounded for any erroneous values. The bound is set at 60 cm.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        Thread.run()

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Get the distance in cm sampled and filtered from the ultrasonic sensor
        Returns:
        Filtered distance in cm sampled from ultrasonic sensor
